widget.name: HelloCordova

meta.content: script-src 'self' http://10.0.2.2/findme-wp/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';default-src 'self' data: gap: http://10.0.2.2/findme-wp/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; media-src *; connect-src http://10.0.2.2/findme-wp/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php:*

widget.description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.
widget.author: Apache Cordova Team
